# Aufgabe 1.1

This is neat: $e^{\pi i} + 1 = 0$.

Also this is kinda of a biggie:

$$
\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^n x_i
$$
Also this one:

$$
\frac{1}{n-1} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \bar{x}\right)^2
$$
